Posts.Content: Hi debden6364                                  I have just been diagnosed with grade 3 also in my lymph nodes.......I am due to go for mastectomy and lymph nodes removed...would like to hear how  it all went for you....would be very helpful to me....thanks
Posts.Title: Bloody cancer!

Posts.Content: Hi jmwatson, hope all goes well for you on Tuesday....I am new to this site, just been diagnosed am getting all my results on the 25th Nov...... will be told what treatment I will be getting.....feeling a bit scared now.....X
Posts.Title: How long have you waited to have surgery after chemo?

Posts.Content: Thanks Squeaky...will let you know once I know more....
Posts.Title: How long have you waited to have surgery after chemo?

Posts.Content: Hi all....can anyone give me advice as I am going through mastectomy and lymph nodes removed on my right side on the 15th Dec...I am getting anxious now as my time is getting so near...any info will be grateful to help me on what to expect or not expect as the case may be...thank you
Posts.Title: Mastectomy and lymph nodes removed

Posts.Content: Thank you for all your kind and comforting message's, you all have gave me the strength I am needing at the moment,  go in for my assessment the day....I feel very fit so all should be fine. I have been lucky enough (so far) not to catch this horrible cold that is going about in my area, have had to keep my family & friends at bay that is chocked with the cold.....so am feeling good.
Posts.Title: Mastectomy and lymph nodes removed

Posts.Content: Hi Mistymoley,  thanks for info.....especially the squash I never thought of that...I have had no treatment as yet but have to get chemo and radiotherapy after my Mastectomy...maybe do reconstruction at a later date but really don't want to talk about that yet just want to concentrate on this... stage first         thank you for letting me know the pain is minimal, this is what am scarred of...as in a few weeks after op..
Posts.Title: Mastectomy and lymph nodes removed

Posts.Content: Thanks Peepee.......you are making me feel more relaxed about it....am going to take all the pain relieve they give me...lol   and also take before my exercises as you have said....hugs send right back
